Customer Service

We provide an exceptional and seamless customer experience for your business. With comprehensive knowledge of your products and services, our professional Call Agents are solely U.S. based to ensure the highest level of service that your customers expect and deserve. We’re here to help, whenever and wherever you need it. Find out how we have helped our clients increase their brand reputation with our personalized call center solutions.

The TeleDirect Difference

  • Agility & Scalability
  • Agent Quality & Training
  • Experience & Knowledge
  • Reliable Infrastructure
  • Personalized Collaboration
  • Information Security

The Moment of Truth

A customers' impression of our client is defined by their interaction with our representatives, the "Moment of Truth." This is our window of opportunity to create a positive image of the company we are representing, excel at these moments and continue these successful interactions because it is all we do and why our company exists. See how our own customer service formula benefits your own customers – all in an affordable, flexible outsourced customer service call center platform.

Agent Experience

TeleDirect's knowledgeable and professional Agents are a true extension of your company to help reach and surpass your customer service goals. Our Agents are constantly evaluated and rewarded through their call performance, without a commission-based structure to focus on high quality and customer engagement. With our bilingual and U.S.-only based staff helping your customers across multiple channels, find out why our customer service and experience are unparalleled nationwide.

Get more info

Training & Quality

All of our agents undergo a rigorous selection process which includes a thorough background check to maintain our high security and confidentiality standards. Continuous call monitoring throughout training and employment ensure only the most qualified and professional Agents remain with us to provide you the best representation of your company. Contact us to find out how we will implement your campaign with our highly trained Agents ready to exceed your expectations.

Get more info

Industry Expertise

With a focus on customer-centric interactions and effective communication, our clients in all industries know how important they are to us. Through effective account management and open dialogue to always ensure we're on the same page, your company growth and continued success is what we're here for.

Get more info

Exceptional Customer Service, Full Call Center Capability

Customer Service Call Center | Customer Service Outsourcing | Customer Service Call Center Representatives | Inbound Customer Service Call Center | And Much More!

TeleDirect’s full-service call center capability and unmatched customer service wouldn’t be possible without our well-trained agents, industry expertise, and meticulous training techniques. When you sign up with TeleDirect, we get to know your business – its unique processes, specific industry requirements, and other operational details – as well as you do! This learning process on our end opens the gateway to superior outsourced customer service for all aspects of your call center.

Outsourced customer service, including inbound customer call center services, is an innovative, bottom line friendly approach to exceeding customer expectations, if you know where to find the right solutions. For many companies, TeleDirect’s customer service inbound call center and outsourced customer support services empower companies to focus on their core services, which improves customer service on a continual basis.

To provide the best inbound service, we start with a thorough overall assessment of your customer service call center. This includes:

  • Latent system deficiencies
  • Full analysis of where outsourced customer support services can help
  • Opportunities for improvement
  • Potential add-on services to optimize your inbound customer support services
  • Customized ideas for your specific customer service on call requirements
  • Complete customer call center plan to move your communication strategy forward

Our inbound customer support services can help. TeleDirect knows inbound call center services are critical to your firm’s overall communication strategy. If your call center can’t address customer concerns immediately, you’ll quickly lose customers. They’ll find another business that is more receptive to their demands. But don’t worry – you don’t have to be a customer support call center expert to improve your inbound customer service solutions. With TeleDirect, our outsourced customer support services improve your response time and align customer requests with your business model. See how we can help today!

Inbound Customer Service Services: Exceeding Expectations, One Customer Service Call Center at a Time!

Do you REALLY know how much your customers trust your customer call center? Are there some things you can do right now to improve your inbound customer support services? Having TeleDirect’s customer service on call enables you to analyze and assess where I improvements are necessary – and what you can do without. Our outsourced customer support services take the mystery out of keeping your clients happy.

Your customer call center listens to clients – but are you listening in return? One surefire way to gauge your call center customer support services, particularly as they relate to inbound customer service, is with client feedback. TeleDirect’s intuitive call center platform and customer service outsourcing tools ensure you’re ahead of the curve.

For many companies, handling their own customer service inbound call center presents major challenges. Do they have the live agents necessary to handle exceptionally large call volumes? How is the backend technology (automation, hardware & infrastructure, etc.) performance? What about inbound customer support services and the ability to deliver customer service on call? These are just a few key questions that define any business’s inbound customer service program.

TeleDirect’s inbound customer services include direct response & media support, overflow & after-hours support, reservation & help desk services, Tier 1 tech support and much more. Everything you need with a customer service call center is included with TeleDirect’s BPO platform. Part of the problem is figuring out what your current call center customer support services lack. We’ll assess your entire inbound customer service services for latent deficiencies, areas to improve, and much more. Simply fill out our customer contact form and enjoy improved inbound call center customer service from day one with TeleDirect!

Beyond Inbound Customer Service: Live Agent Support & Much More!

Thanks to our professional agents, TeleDirect hits the ground running with your customer service call center. We reduce lag time, increase efficiency, and make your inbound customer service call center run smoothly during regular days, peak volume, and more.

But it’s not just our live support that’s earned positive reviews; TeleDirect’s built-in technology offers a distinct advantage over other business process outsourcing (BPO) providers. Here are just a few examples why we are the best US based call center and why our customer service outsourcing is preferred for any sized enterprise:

  • Multi-industry coverage. From healthcare to financial service and pretty much every business sector in between, TeleDirect’s reputation as a leading inbound customer support services provider has never been stronger. Whatever your industry is, or your specific need with call center customer support services, we’ll improve your inbound service right away! Our call center customer service capability is ideal for healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, and many other business sectors. Contact TeleDirect today.
  • Proven results. Real-time reporting, industry-leading agent training, cutting-edge infrastructure and more – each and every day, TeleDirect delivers on our promise to provide value and results. Does your current call center service provider go the extra mile for you? If not, it’s time to switch to TeleDirect.
  • Inbound solutions. As we already discussed, our customer service call center platform handles your entire inbound traffic. Plus, with advanced analytics and real-time reporting, we give you useful, real-time intelligence you can leverage toward sales goals, client retention, and much more! See how our inbound call center customer service can help today.
  • Outbound services. Your message is important. And with TeleDirect’s complete BPO outbound messaging tools, you’ll take control of your outbound communication strategy like never before. Once you’re in the driver’s seat with your outbound services, everything else falls into place. From social media assistance to lead response tools, TeleDirect’s call center customer service system is ready to help today!
  • Call center expertise. TeleDirect’s inbound service & call center platform is scalable, customizable, flexible, adaptable – and thanks to advanced infrastructure with impressive uptime statistics, darn near indestructible. From small fixes to system-wide overhauls, we have the system you need to improve your customer service call center. What’s more, our customer support call center services keep client satisfaction levels high, even as we keep overall operating costs low. It’s the best of both worlds with TeleDirect.
  • Top trained, professional customer service call center representatives. Sure, technology is essential for effective customer service outsourcing. But sometimes, your customers need a real person to talk with. TeleDirect’s customer service call center representative are ideal for a wide range of business sectors, as our live agents excel in the healthcare, insurance, and financial services industries – just to name a few! No matter your area of expertise, TeleDirect has the inbound customer support services you need to succeed, including customer service call center representatives.
  • Scripting tools, seamless integration & more. Looking for automated excellence with your inbound customer service solutions? No other customer service call center comes close to TeleDirect’s advanced scripting tools, security & redundancy, and unified cloud communication. It’s all part of the exceptional value & proven results we deliver to our customers all the time. Whether it’s through inbound customer service services or improved performance with our customer service inbound call center, TeleDirect puts you ahead of the technology curve – and for outsourced customer support and call center activities, that enables you to concentrate on what you do best – serving your own clients! With so much backend technical expertise behind our outsourced customer service for call centers, you’re able to provide exceptional front-end service for your clients on a face to face (or call to call) basis.

Get Professional Inbound Customer Service Solutions with TeleDirect

Your clients are the lifeblood of your enterprise, and they depend on you to deliver products and services. But if your inbound customer service or customer service call center isn’t up to speed, client retention will suffer. If your clients aren’t getting the best possible customer service, they’ll go elsewhere.

Some companies think they’re too busy to worry about inbound customer support services. But that’s one of the biggest mistakes an enterprise can make. Whether you require a customer service on call platform or total customer call center support, TeleDirect offers an affordable, fully integrated outsourced solution. We’ll ensure your inbound customer support services are on task, all the time!

Fortunately, TeleDirect’s customer service outsourcing and call center solutions are only a phone call away. We’ll provide everything you need, including a flexible and robust outsourced platform that’s easy to implement, and also easy on your bottom line. TeleDirect has streamlined the process to select, source and implement customer service call center tools. Fill out our customer contact form, and our outsource customer service experts will be in touch.

Contact TeleDirect for Professional Customer Service Outsourcing and Boost Your Inbound Customer Support Services Today!

Whether you need a boost with your social media customer service, improve inbound customer service solutions or require wholesale updates with your call center, TeleDirect works to find a comprehensive, finely calibrated customer service call center solution. Fill out our customer contact form, and a TeleDirect business consultant will be in touch with real-time, real-life, practical solutions. We take great pride in being the best US based call center!

You can also speak with our call center experts directly at (800) 776-1081. Don’t let another day slip by without TeleDirect’s customer service inbound call center and inbound customer services. We look forward to implementing or improving your u call center customer service – contact us today to get started. Thanks for visiting TeleDirect!
